alert.note: Alert for Cape Girardeau; Perry; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 7:54PM CDT until May 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau. Mississippi River at Thebes. .Recent heavy rainfall will lead to moderate flooding at Cape Girardeau and Thebes early next week. For the Mississippi River...including Cape Girardeau, Thebes... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH SATURDAY, MAY 14... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau. * WHEN...Until Saturday, May 14. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, The flood gate at Broadway closes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 32.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 38.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage next Saturday, May 14. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
